CourseOverview: Ypsilon Advanced Skills Hub offers a 12-day course in Instructional System Design (ISD). Gain expertise in crafting effective instructional systems from expert trainers.
CourseDescription: Ypsilon Advanced Skills Hub (YASH) presents a comprehensive 12-day professional training course in Instructional System Design (ISD).This course will equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to design effective instructional systems for various educational and training contexts. Expert trainers will guide participants through essential concepts.
Timing: Daily Batch from 7.00 PM to 8.30 PM
InstructorInfo: 25 years of experience in curriculum development, instruction design, teachers' training and skill development

CourseReview.Participant2: The course was well-structured and easy to follow.
CourseReview.Participant1: The instructor was knowledgeable and engaging.

CourseContent.Content: Introduction to ISD - Understanding the structure of instructional systems

CourseContent.Title: Module 2 - Curriculum Development, Instruction Plans, Bloom's Taxonomy, Educational Implications
CourseContent.Content: Curriculum development process - Instructional planning - Bloom's Taxonomy and its implications

CourseContent.Title: Module 3 - Curriculum Development, Instruction Plans, Bloom's Taxonomy, Educational Implications
CourseContent.Content: Curriculum development process (continued) - Instructional planning (continued) - Educational implications of ISD

CourseContent.Title: Module 4 - Evaluation Approaches: Formative, Summative, Criterion Referenced
CourseContent.Content: Understanding formative evaluation - Exploring summative evaluation - Implementing criterion-referenced evaluation

CourseContent.Title: Module 5 - Evaluation Approaches: Formative, Summative, Criterion Referenced
Module 6 - Assessment tools
CourseContent.Content: Types of assessment tools - Developing effective assessment strategies and Hands-on practice with assessment tools

CourseContent.Title: Module 7 - Use of AI and e-content tools for content creation
CourseContent.Content: Integrating AI in content creation - Leveraging e-content tools for instructional design

CourseContent.Title: Module 8 - Use of AI and e-content tools for content creation
CourseContent.Content: Practical applications of AI and e-content tools

CourseContent.Title: Module 9 - Review and Application
CourseContent.Content: Review of key concepts and methodologies learned - Application exercises and case studies

CourseContent.Title: Module 10 - Review and Application
CourseContent.Content: Review of key concepts and methodologies learned (continued) - Application exercises and case studies (continued)
